scripts.lint: prettier --check 'src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json,css}' && echo 'Running ESLint...' && eslint src --report-unused-disable-directives --max-warnings 0 && echo 'All files pass linting!'
scripts.build: npm run clean && sed -i.bak '/setCookie(/d' ../../node_modules/@types/request/index.d.ts && tsc && vite build
